title: Obolflip
summary: Obolflip is a client-side application that can be used for taking bets on a coin flip or for managing flips and earning revenue, depending on local laws. It can be deployed on a server to allow other users to place bets, generating additional revenue from withdrawals.

sections.heading: Obolflip
sections.content: [ObolFlip](https://github.com/ObolFlip/obolflip-client) client can be used for taking bets on a flip or for managing flips and earning revenue, depending on what's legal in your location. You can even deploy it on a server and let other users do bets, earning extra revenue for withdrawals.
